Key: She's late...

(I looked at my watch and muttered again for the
umpteenth time.)
Hey, Kotori!

Are you ready yet? We need to go soon, or we won't
make it in time.
Ahhh. Hold on, hold on～!

(I heard her running all over the house. Eventually,
she jumped out with a travel bag.)
Sorry, sorry, Thanks for waiting, Shido! Let's go.
You sure took a long time. What were you doing?

Gosh. Girls have to get ready for a lot of things.
It's crass of you to ask that.

(Kotori pouted a little, and her trademark ribbon
moved.)
(It seems more pointed than usual.)
Kotori, you're really dressed up today.
Oh, can you tell?
(Kotori twirled.)

Hehehe. I saved this for today. What do you think?
Do I look good?
Yeah, it looks very good. You're cute as usual.
Really? Hehehe.
(Kotori smiled. I could tell she was really happy.)

(But yeah, she's actually really cute. She looks like a
fine lady heading off to a summer resort.)
I'm happy that you noticed, but I'm a bit shy.

Do you think I'm too giddy about it? Being all excited
like this?
Why? Of course I wouldn't think that.
It makes me happy that you're excited.

I mean, I was so excited that I couldn't even sleep
much last night.

Hehe. Shido, you're like a kid before a school trip.
I guess it makes sense why you overslept today.

Shut up. You took so much time getting ready, so we're
even.
Hehe... You're right. We are even.

(If I'm going to travel with just Kotori, then of course
I'd be excited about it.)

(I was so excited last night that I couldn't sleep
and overslept this morning.)

No matter how hard I tried to wake you, you wouldn't
budge. I didn't know what to do.
I said I'm sorry.

But it's all thanks to you that we can go on a trip
like this.
Well, I wouldn't say it's thanks to me.

(Although Kotori and I are able to go out today, it
wasn't that easy.)

(Both Kotori and I are underage, so an overnight trip
required approvals.)

(Since our midterms were coming up, we could only get
approval if we got better grades.)

(Kotori's at the top of her class, so she was fine. I
was another issue.)

(Every night, Kotori tutored me. Age-wise, it should
have gone the other way, but I don't like to mention
that.)

(Oh, and Kotori was hardcore in tutoring me...
Cramming? All nighters? Those are nothing.)

(Nothing compared to solving 100 variations of
formulas while standing on tippy-toe. Oh, and if you
got one wrong, you had to do a half-legged squat.)
I'm surprised I survived...

But it trained your legs, right? And if your grades
also went up, that's even better.

(Kotori snickered. Normally I would think she's a
brat, but I can't get mad at her for this.)

I guess it's thanks to you, Kotori... So I appreciate
your help.
(Although I couldn't walk for a while.)

It sounds like you don't mean it. But I'm glad you
worked hard, Shido.

Well, I guess I should have studied on a regular
basis.

I know you worked hard for me, so that does honestly
make me happy.
Thanks, Shido.
(That kinda tickles if she puts it that way.)

(Anyways, we got the approval. So we are going to have
a blast.)
All right. Let's head out. Did you bring everything?

Hold on. Okay, so a change of clothes, snacks, a guide
book, and airplane tickets.
Okay, we have everything.

(Kotori took out an envelope with two tickets inside.
Looking at it like this, it's sinking in that we're
actually going on a trip.)
Wouldn't it be nice if we could go more casually?
Casually?

Yeah. For example, if we had a car, we wouldn't have
to buy any tickets, right?
That's if we're going to go somewhere far like today.
But I don't have my driver's license yet.
No, I can get it.

(In a few years, I'll be able to get my license. It'll
be faster than waiting for Kotori to get hers, so I
want to do that much for her.)

If we had a car, we could go to so many places
casually.

It'd be nice to go somewhere nearby and not have to
worry about anyone else while we're on the move.
Doesn't that sound fun?
Shido...
(Kotori's expression turned soft.)
I like how you're so considerate. Kinda unexpected.
Unexpected? How rude.
Yeah? Well then, let me rephrase it.
I love you, Shido. I love you so much.
(To have her say it to my face made me blush.)
Me too, Kotori. I love you so much.

Yeah. We'll be together always. Let's go on many more
trips together.

Of course. There are still a lot of places and things
I want to do.

Yeah. Like the southern islands, the hot springs, and
places within the country or abroad.
Do you also want to do winter mountain climbing?
No, I was only kidding on that one.
Hehehe.
But... No matter where I go, it'll be with you, Shido.

(Kotori wrapped her fingers around mine. Our eyes
locked.)
Shido.
Kotori.
(We caught each other's eyes, and Kotori looked down.)

(Our faces neared as naturally as if we were
breathing.)
...Hey, I feel like I'm forgetting something.
Huh? Oh, no...! The time!
Crap! Let's run, Kotori!
Ah! H-Hey!
(I started running, dragging Kotori behind me.)
Gosh! Why are we all over the place from the get-go?!

It's because you took your time dressing up! I mean,
it is cute!

It's because you overslept! But you did look cute
sleeping!

(Were we bickering or complimenting? We yapped at
each other as we ran.)

(If someone were just listening, it may have seemed
like we were fighting, but Kotori and I were smiling.)

Hey, Shido. Let's also make plans for the next trip,
okay?

Oh, come on. We're just starting the first one. You're
getting ahead of yourself.

It's fine. We're going to plan the next one, and the
next one, and the ones for all eternity.

Of course you'll be coming with me on every single
one of them.
That's a big responsibility!
Of course!

(Kotori sped up and ran past me. Then she turned
around.)
(Her smile was like a flower blooming.)
Oh, and by the way, this isn't a command.
Then what is it?
It's a favor. Can't you tell?
Right... From my adorable little sister―
―What was that?

A-A favor from my adorable girlfriend, right? Then of
course I'm going to have to accept.

Hehe. It seems like you'll go through anything with
me.
Well, that doesn't sound good...

From now on, I'll try my best not to order you around.
I'll ask. That way, you'll listen. Right?
Gosh, what am I going to do with you... My girlfriend.

That's right. This is the kind of person your
girlfriend is. Do you hate me now?

Nope. I love you. So much I can't take it. Everything
about you, Kotori.

I love you too, Shido. From the bottom of my heart.
So please, be with me forever...

I guess I'm going to have to make that happen.
Kotori, I think I should ask you this, too. Be with me
forever.
Okay!
